steps.name: I have made changes to one or more translations
some period of time passes
I want my translations to be backed up
I want to be notified that the backup has occured.
a backup of my translations has been made
I have opened the sharing view
I choose to import a project
I want to be able to select a backup file to import

name: Auto backup
description:
The app will automatically backup translations.
  The amount of time that must pass before a backup occures
  may be configurable by the user.

steps.name: I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I have entered some text into the translation field
I am inactive for a few moments
I want my changes to be saved
I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I have entered some text into the translation field
I open a different frame
I want my changes to be saved
I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I have entered some text into the translation field
I leave the main activity
I want my changes to be saved
I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I have chosen to save the translations to the sd card.
the auto save is executed
I want my changes to be saved to the external sd card.

name: Auto save
description: The app will automatically save translations

steps.name: I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I have opened the contextual menu
the blind draft mode is disabled
I click on the "toggle blind draft mode" button
I want to see the blind draft mode
I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I have opened the contextual menu
the blind draft mode is enabled
I click on the "toggle blind draft mode" button
I want to see the default mode

name: Blind draft mode
description:
Two translation modes will be available to translators.
  The default mode has the source on the left and the translation on the right.
  The blind draft mode will only display the translation.

steps.name: I am viewing the main activity
I have found a bug in the app
I click on the bug report button from the menu
I want to see the bug report form
I am viewing the main activity
I have opened the bug report form
I click on the submit button
I have not entered any notes
there there are no error messages in the log
I want to be prompted to describe what the problem is.
I am viewing the main activity
I have opened the bug report form
I click on the submit button
I have entered less than three words.
I want to be prompted to provide more detail about the problem.

name: Bug report
description: Translators will be able to submit bug reports to developers when they encounter problems while using the app

steps.name: I have opened a project
I am viewing the main activity
the project contains a translatable title and/or reference
the chapter title and reference have not been translated
I choose a frame from the library
I want to view the chapter settings
I have opened a project
I am viewing the main activity
the project contains a translatable title and/or reference
the chapter title and reference have not been translated
I click on the chapter settings button from the menu
I want to view the chapter settings

name: Chapter settings
description:
Chapter settings allow translators to translate chapter title and reference
  for projects that support such translations.

steps.name: I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I click on the contextual menu icon
I want to see the contextual menu

name: Contextual menu
description:
A contextual menu will be available for translators to provide quick access to
  context aware tools.

steps.name: the app has crashed
I first reopen the app
I want to see the crash report interface

name: Crash report
description:
When the app crashes it will ask users to provide details describing what they were doing when the app crashed.
  A stack trace along with device information is submitted as a github issue.
  No personal information is collected.

steps.name: I am viewing the sharing interface
I click on the export to app menu item
I want to export the current project to an app of my choice (e.g. email)
I am viewing the sharing interface
I click on the export to sd card menu item
I want to export the current project to my sd card
I am viewing the sharing interface
I click on the export to device menu item
I want my translations to be available for download to other devices with the app installed

name: Export
description:
Translators will be able to export their translations in a number of different formats
  to a number of different devices
  Note: currently due to device restrictions exporting to the sd card is performed on the internal storage.

steps.name: I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I swipe from right to left
I want to see the next frame
I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I swipe from left to right
I want to see the previous frame
I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I click on the device back button
I want to return to the previously selected frame

name: Frame swipe navigation
description: Translations will be able to quickly move between frames by swiping left or right.

steps.name: I am viewing the sharing interface
I click on the import from sd card menu item
i want to choose a file from my sd card to import
I am viewing the sharing interface
I click on the import from nearby device menu item
I want to browse devices that are sharing translations
I am viewing the nearby device interface
I have chosen a device to connect to
the device has approved my connection
I click browse projects
I want to see a list of projects that I can import

name: Import
description: Translators will be able to import translations that they will then be able to continue working on.

elements.name: Ask user for permission to use internet

steps.name: the device is capable of performing network operations
the next operation will consume network data
I begin the operation
I want to be warned the operation will consume network data
I want to be asked to proceed or cancel

name: Internet Usage Confirmation
description:
Translators may have limited or expensive network data available.
  The app should always confirm with the user before performing
  network operations.

steps.name: I have requested to choose a language (Project settings) or the app is promting me to choose a language
I am viewing the language selector
I type in a search query
I want to view a list of languages that match the search query
I want the results ordered by best match in language code followed by language name
I have requested to choose a language (Project settings) or the app is promting me to choose a language
I am viewing the language selector
I click on a language in the list
I want that language to be chosen for use in my current context

name: Language selector
description:
The language selector allows the user to browse, search and choose a spoken language
  from those available.

steps.name: I have not previously opened this project
I click on the project within the project library
I want to be prompted to choose the source language
I want to be prompted to choose the target language
I want to view available chapters in the project to choose from

elements.name: Open Chapter with translatable title or reference

steps.name: I have selected the source language
I have selected the target language
I choose a chapter
the chapter has a translatable title and/or chapter reference
I want to be prompted to translate the title and/or chapter reference
I have selected the source language
I have selected the target language
I choose a chapter
I want to view available frames in the chapter to choose from
I have selected a chapter
I choose a frame
I want to see the translator interface
I want the source for the selected frame to be shown on the left
I want any existing translation for the frame to be shown on the right.
I have previously opened this project
I click on the project within the project library
I want to be resume where I last left off in this project

name: Open Project
description:
Projects are groups of related translatable material broken up
  into chapters and frames.
  A project must have at least one chapter.
  A chapter must have at least one frame.
  A frame must have a source translation.

steps.name: I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I have opened the contextual menu
I click on the preview translation button
I want to see the translation for the entire chapter

name: Preview translation
description:
Translators will be able to preview their translation work
  to make sure it all flows well together.

elements.name: Show when first opening a project

steps.name: I have not opened the project before
I open the project
I want to view the project settings

I click on the project settings button from the menu
I want to view the project settings

click on the source language
I want to view a list of source languages available for this project to choose frame
I am viewing the project settings
I click on the target language
I want to view a list of target languages to choose from

name: Project Language Settings
description:
Project language settings allows translators to change the source language they will be translating from
  and the target language they will be translating to.

name: Open library
description: The project library will be accessible to the user in a number of different ways

name: Publish and Backup
description: Translators will be able to upload their translation to the server and optionally mark it as being ready

steps.name: I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main activity
I have opened the contextual menu
I click on the read chapter button
i want to view the source text for the entire chapter.

name: Read Chapter
description:
Translators will be able to read through an entire chapter in a source langugae
  to help them gain a better context of the frame they are translating

steps.name: I am online
I am viewing the project library
I click on the get more projects button
I want to be able to browse projects on the server, import projects from another device, or import from the sd card.

I want to view the available translation drafts

I want to download the resources for that language
I am online
I chose to browse projects on the server
I click on the download all button
I want to download all the new and updated projects on the server

name: Server project library
description: Translators will be able to download new projects and update existing ones from the server.

steps.name: I am viewing the main activity
I click on the settings menu item
I want to view the app settings

name: Settings
description: Translators can configure a number of different settings in the app to help them in their translation

steps.name: I am viewing the main activity
I click on the sharing menu item
I want to view the sharing interface

name: Sharing interface
description: Translators will be able to manage all of their sharing and importing from the sharing interface

steps.name: I have just started the app
I have not previously accepted the terms of use

I tap on the accept button

to continue loading the app
I have just started the app
I have not previously accepted the terms of use
I am viewing the Terms of Use
I tap on the reject button
I want the app to close
I have just started the app
I have not previously accepted the terms of use
I am viewing the Terms of Use
I tap on a document link
I want to read the document

name: Terms of Use
description:
Translators must agree to the terms of use before using the app.
  The Terms of Use view will consist of a general statement
  requiring users to agree to the content license, translation 
  guidelines, and statement of faith. Links to related documents will be available for further reading.

I am viewing the main frame
I tap on the translation input field
I want the translation menu to appear
I have selected a frame
I am viewing the main frame
I am in translation mode
the source text supports markers
I click on a marker from the translation menu
I want the marker to be inserted into the translation at the current cursor position

I am viewing the main frame
I am in translation mode
the source text supports notes

I click on the insert note button
I want to enter my note that will be attached to the selected text.

elements.name: Enter translation mode for Translation Note

I click on the edit button
I want to enter into translation mode for the Translation Notes
I have selected a frame

elements.name: Exit translation mode for Translation Notes

steps.name: I am translating the Translation Notes
I click on the ok button
I want to exit the translation mode for the Translation Notes
save my translations

name: Translating
description:
Translators will be able to type in their translation of the source text and optionally insert
  verse markers, notes, etc.

steps.name: I have downloaded the appropriate translation draft from the server
I am viewing the project settings
I have selected the target language that corresponds to the translation draft

I have downloaded the appropriate translation draft from the server
I am viewing the project settings
I have selected the target language that corresponds to the translation draft
I click on the view draft button
I want to view the translation draft in read only mode
I have downloaded the appropriate translation draft from the server
I am viewing the project settings
I am viewing the translation draft in read only mode
I click on the approve button
I provide my password I want to generate digital signature that marks the translation draft as approved by myself

name: Use translation drafts:
description:
Translators will be able to import a translation draft in order to improve or continue
  the translation. Translation drafts will also be viewed in a read only mode in which case they may be
  marked as approved by a translator

steps.name: I have selected a frame
the frame has translation notes
I have just opened the translation resources drawer
I click on the translation notes tab
I want to see the translation notes

name: View translation notes
description:
Translation notes give translators some context around key phrases within the passage.
  These notes will also be displayed by default in the translation resources.

steps.name: I am viewing a frame
I swipe from the right
I want to see the translation resources for the current frame
I am viewing a frame
I click on the resources button from the menu
I want to see the translation resoruces for the current frame

name: View translation resources
description:
Each project may have a set of translation resources to assist translators in translating
  from the Source Lanuage.

name: Walkthrough
description: Certain operations will need to be performed the first time the app starts.
